title: Net-juu no Susume Special (Recovery of an MMO Junkie Special)
synopsis: Much to her dismay, Moriko Morioka's computer has broken down. However, not all is lost as she remembers that Yuuta Sakurai is a computer geek, leading Morioka to seek his expertise. But when Sakurai visits to help build her a new computer, hilarity ensues.
voices: ['Noto, Mamiko', 'Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Ueda, Reina', 'Suzuki, Ryouta', 'Maeno, Tomoaki', 'Nakamura, Yuuichi', 'Terashima, Takuma', 'Aisaka, Yuuka', 'Sunseki, Kazuhiro', 'Maeno, Tomoaki']
staff: [['Chapin, Clifford', ['ADR Director']], ['Fukunaga, Gen', ['Executive Producer']], ['Kokuyou, Rin', ['Original Creator']]]
